page.title: 01EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATIONAL AMENITIES In the area there are only three educational establishments and all are in Buxted.The buxted playgroup caters for the 3 to 4 age group .Buxted Primary school caters for children from 4.5 to 11+.The secondary school is outside this block. There is also Harrock House, a rural studies residential centre for London school,this is for sale. Our School. The school was built of sandstone in 1874 with tall windows like a church so that the children could not look out. We have a large playing field and a small tarmac playground.There is a concrete canteen that serves as a hall and a newish prefabricated classroom.
